_doc: Tracks per-skill evaluation status with independent routing and content dimensions. Updated by tasks .2-.5. routing_status tracks L3/L4 routing quality; content_status tracks L5/L6 content quality.

_transitions..5: sets routing_status/content_status to verified after re-verification
_transitions.overall_status: passing only when all non-untested dimensions are passing/verified/exception

dotnet-architecture-patterns.notes: Fixed false negative (act-005). Added layered patterns keyword. Targeted re-run: act-005 now passes (17P/2F, only neg-016 parse_failure and neg-018 pre-existing).

dotnet-system-commandline.notes: Fixed false negative (act-012). Moved System.CommandLine 2.0 to lead, added RootCommand/Option<T>/tab completion. Targeted re-run: act-012 now passes (17P/2F).

dotnet-resilience.notes: Fixed false negative (act-017). Moved Polly v8 to lead, added rate limiter/HttpClient keywords. Targeted re-run: act-017 now passes (18P/2F). L5 win_rate=100% unchanged.

dotnet-container-deployment.notes: Fixed false positive (neg-004). Removed explicit Kubernetes keyword, qualified with .NET. Post-fix re-run (5fd7c96e): neg-004 now passes. Pre-fix run (1ef0e510) showed neg-004 still failing.

dotnet-messaging-patterns.notes: Attempted fix in .3 (5a00da0, de9b8e7): added .NET + MassTransit/Azure Service Bus qualifiers. Reduced false activations from 4+ skills to 1, but neg-018 still activates dotnet-messaging-patterns alone. Needs further description refinement to distinguish .NET messaging from generic RabbitMQ.

dotnet-efcore-architecture.notes: L4 data group 80% (1 case routed to advisor). Group still above 60% threshold.

dotnet-xunit.notes: L6 BASELINE SWEEP fixed: trimmed body from 17.5KB to 8.7KB. Removed verbose v2 compat comments, ILogger integration, redundant examples, condensed analyzer rules. Retained core patterns (Fact/Theory, fixtures, key principles, agent gotchas). Verification requires re-run outside nested Claude session.

dotnet-blazor-patterns.notes: L5 win_rate=100%. L6 split 1-1 full/baseline, mean=-0.100. Borderline -- monitor.

dotnet-csharp-async-patterns.notes: L5 win_rate=83.3%. L6 full wins 2-1, mean=+0.417. OK.

dotnet-csharp-coding-standards.notes: L6 BASELINE WINS fixed: trimmed body from 12.2KB to 5.7KB. Removed verbose correct/avoid code blocks, Type Design section (duplicates dotnet-solid-principles), Knowledge Sources. Condensed code style rules to concise bullets. Retained naming table, CancellationToken, XML docs, analyzer config. Verification requires re-run outside nested Claude session.

dotnet-efcore-patterns.notes: L5 win_rate=83.3%. L6 full wins 2-0, mean=+1.525. Strong.

dotnet-observability.notes: L5 win_rate=100%. L6 full wins 3-0, mean=+0.800. Strong.

dotnet-security-owasp.notes: L5 win_rate=83.3%. L6 full wins 1-0, mean=+1.250 (low n due to errors). OK.

dotnet-testing-strategy.notes: L5 win_rate=66.7% (passing but lowest tier). Timeout on later run is infrastructure issue.

dotnet-windbg-debugging.notes: L6 baseline wins 2-1 fixed: restructured body from 2.9KB to 4.4KB. Replaced generic quick-start file references with concrete diagnostic workflows (crash dump, hang/deadlock, high CPU, memory pressure) including actual WinDbg/SOS commands and report template. Verification requires re-run outside nested Claude session.

dotnet-ado-patterns.notes: L6 baseline wins 2-1 fixed: restructured body from 3.3KB to 5.9KB. Inlined key YAML pipeline patterns (step templates, extends, variable groups, conditional insertion, triggers) from examples.md. Previous body was just Agent Gotchas -- too little actionable content. Verification requires re-run outside nested Claude session.

dotnet-csharp-code-smells.notes: L6 full wins 2-0 with 1 tie, mean=+0.700. OK.
